service_description: With the help of Machine Learning and AI, we can help you with the metrics beforehand to make right business decisions.

steps.name: Data Preprocessing
steps.description: Clean up, augmenting, sampling balance etc...

steps.name: Modeling
steps.description: Try algorithms that works best under business constraints

steps.name: Validation
steps.description: From simple train test split to out of sample.. validation of business justification also matters..

steps.name: Hosting
steps.description: Make the model serve the prediction and integrate to existing system
